definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: If you have any problem(s) filling in this form, please contact your account opening branch.
sentences.chinese: 如于填写本表格时有任何疑问，请向开户分行查询。

sentences.english: A monthly report on an individuals account activity at the bank they have an account(s) with.
sentences.chinese: 银行为开户个人提供其帐户活动情况的月报表。

sentences.english: Please inform your bank of any change of address as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如地址发生变更，请尽快通知您的开户行。

sentences.english: Certainly the UI would be identical -- it's just that various fields would be blank when you opened the account.
sentences.chinese: 只是在开户时某些字段可能会是空白。

sentences.english: How do you intend to fully comply with ODL's account opening procedures and ensure that genuine documentation is supplied to us?
sentences.chinese: 您如何按照本公司开户要求提供客户真实可靠的资料？

sentences.english: "Accounts Bank" shall have the meaning defined in the Accounts Agreement.
sentences.chinese: “开户行”与账户协议中所界定的含义相同。

sentences.english: Inform credit, debit, and ATM card banks and companies about your travel plans.
sentences.chinese: 向你的开户行告知你的行程计划。

sentences.english: I'd like to open an account in your bank. Should I take a number first?
sentences.chinese: 我念正在您们银止开户。我要先与号码牌吗？

sentences.english: Payees can either cash their money orders or present them to their bank for collection.
sentences.chinese: 收款人可以兑现其汇款单也可提交给其开户行托收。

sentences.english: If the address changed,inform you of the bank of deposit as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如地址发生变更，请尽快通知您的开户行。

sentences.english: Bank of deposit and account information are published in the announcement for bidding by Bidding Committee.
sentences.chinese: 开户行和帐号信息由招标委员会在招标公告中发布。

sentences.english: B. Your account is with the Bank of Wales, right?
sentences.chinese: 你的开户行是威尔士银行，对吗？

sentences.english: Today I want to open a bank acount.
sentences.chinese: 首先，去银行开户不一定要税号的。

sentences.english: A set up charge will be deducted from the contribution before investing into the selected funds.
sentences.chinese: 开户费用将会从供款中在存入您所选择的基金前扣除。

sentences.english: The date of presentment for payment shall be the day when the holder submits the negotiable instrument to the holder's bank.
sentences.chinese: 其提示付款日期以持票人向开户银行提交票据日为准。

sentences.english: The Bank reserves the right to decline any account opening request without providing any reason.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留不接受开户申请的权利并毋须提供任何理由。

definition: online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
ICBC (Industrial and Commercial Bank of China)/abbr. for 工商銀行|工商银行[Gong1 Shang1 Yin2 hang2]
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
to withdraw money from a bank
a tax declaration form/a tax return
